sent.orig: A fish swim so light,swim into the heart of the hedgehog,broken the dream of the aquatic.
sent.trans: 一条鱼静静地游过来，游到了刺猬的心中，揉碎了水草里的梦。

sent.orig: If you want to swim you have to jump into the water and swim.
sent.trans: 如果你想游泳，你就要跳进水里，游起来。

sent.orig: They swim and swim. They meet a goldfish.
sent.trans: 他们游啊游。他们看到了一条金鱼。

sent.orig: Some of the lorries swim out to the ships and swim back.
sent.trans: 有些卡车涉水驶到船旁，然后又涉水驶回来。

sent.orig: I may be joyful swim swim, look like a fish to be same.
sent.trans: 我可以快乐得游来游，像一只鱼一样。
